languages.text: "Меня тревожит гибель агентов Ахиллеаса, это может не быть совпадением. Пока не установлены причины катастрофы, я бы избегал приема беженцев в другие ульи — среди них могут быть виновники саботажа. Рекомендую организовать запретительные кордоны и удержать беженцев в пустошах между ульями".

"The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."
languages.original_text: "Меня тревожит гибель агентов Ахиллеаса, это может не быть совпадением. Пока не установлены причины катастрофы, я бы избегал приема беженцев в другие ульи — среди них могут быть виновники саботажа. Рекомендую организовать запретительные кордоны и удержать беженцев в пустошах между ульями".

traits.locale_text: "The death of Achilleas' agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster are established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be those who are responsible for sabotage among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons and hold the refugees in the wastelands between the hives".

languages.text: “阿吉里亚斯特工的死亡令我深感不安，这可能不是什么巧合。如果是我，在具体确定这场灾难的成因之前，我会禁止难民进入其他巢都，因为那些人之中可能藏着破坏分子。我建议设置警戒线，将难民隔离在巢都之间的废土上。”
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."

traits.locale_text: “阿吉里亚斯特工的死亡令我深感不安，这可能不是什么巧合。如果是我，在具体确定这场灾难的成因之前，我会禁止难民进入其他巢都，因为那些人之中可能藏着破坏分子。我建议设置警戒线，将难民隔离在巢都之间的废土上。”

languages.text: «La muerte de los agentes de Achilleas me preocupa, puede que no sea una coincidencia. Hasta que las causas de la catástrofe puedan determinarse con precisión, yo evitaría que los refugiados entraran en otras colmenas: puede haber saboteadores entre ellos. Recomiendo establecer cordones de seguridad, donde los refugiados puedan ser contenidos en los páramos entre las colmenas».
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."

traits.locale_text: «La muerte de los agentes de Achilleas me preocupa, puede que no sea una coincidencia. Hasta que las causas de la catástrofe puedan determinarse con precisión, yo evitaría que los refugiados entraran en otras colmenas: puede haber saboteadores entre ellos. Recomiendo establecer cordones de seguridad, donde los refugiados puedan ser contenidos en los páramos entre las colmenas».

languages.text: 「アキレアスの諜報員が死んだのは悩ましいな...偶然の出来事ではないかもしれない。災害の原因が具体的に解明されるまでは、難民を他のハイヴで受け入れることは避けたい...その中に工作員がいるかもしれないからな。難民をハイヴとハイヴの間のウエストランドに封じ込めることができるよう、禁止区画を設定するのはどうだろう」
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアスの諜報員が死んだのは悩ましいな...偶然の出来事ではないかもしれない。災害の原因が具体的に解明されるまでは、難民を他のハイヴで受け入れることは避けたい...その中に工作員がいるかもしれないからな。難民をハイヴとハイヴの間のウエストランドに封じ込めることができるよう、禁止区画を設定するのはどうだろう」

languages.text: « La mort des agents d'Achilleas m'inquiète, cela n'est peut-être pas une coïncidence. Tant que les causes des catastrophes n'ont pas été établies, j'éviterais de laisser ces réfugiés pénétrer dans d'autres ruches... il pourrait y avoir des saboteurs parmi eux. Je vous recommande d'installer des mesures de sécurité permettant de contenir les réfugiés dans les terres désolées entre les ruches. »
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."

traits.locale_text: « La mort des agents d'Achilleas m'inquiète, cela n'est peut-être pas une coïncidence. Tant que les causes des catastrophes n'ont pas été établies, j'éviterais de laisser ces réfugiés pénétrer dans d'autres ruches... il pourrait y avoir des saboteurs parmi eux. Je vous recommande d'installer des mesures de sécurité permettant de contenir les réfugiés dans les terres désolées entre les ruches. »

languages.text: "Der Tod von Achilleas' Agenten beunruhigt mich — er ist vielleicht kein Zufall. Bis die Ursache für die Katastrophe ermittelt ist, würde ich es vermeiden, Flüchtlinge in andere Makropolen aufzunehmen — es könnten sich Saboteure unter ihnen befinden. Ich empfehlen, Sperrzonen zu errichten, um die Flüchtlinge im Ödland zwischen den Makropolen zu versammeln."
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."

traits.locale_text: "Der Tod von Achilleas' Agenten beunruhigt mich — er ist vielleicht kein Zufall. Bis die Ursache für die Katastrophe ermittelt ist, würde ich es vermeiden, Flüchtlinge in andere Makropolen aufzunehmen — es könnten sich Saboteure unter ihnen befinden. Ich empfehlen, Sperrzonen zu errichten, um die Flüchtlinge im Ödland zwischen den Makropolen zu versammeln."

languages.text: "Achilleas'ın ajanlarının ölümü beni huzursuz ediyor. Bu bir tesadüf olmayabilir. Felaketin sebepleri, aşikâr bir şekilde belirlenene dek mültecilerin diğer kovanlara girişine izin vermekten kaçınırdım. Aralarında sabotajcılar olabilir. Engelleyici kordonlar yerleştirmeyi öneriyorum. Böylece mülteciler, kovanlar arasındaki çorak topraklarda tutulabilir."
languages.original_text: "The death of Achilleas's agents troubles me — it may not be a coincidence. Until the causes of the disaster can be concretely established, I would avoid letting refugees into other hives — there may be saboteurs among them. I recommend setting up prohibitive cordons, where the refugees can be contained in the wastelands between the hives."
